about_the_game:
Welcome to Yondu's Journey, an interactive movie where every decision you make can lead to life or death. Take on the role of Yondu The Fearless and face the challenges that await you in this exciting game.

As you play through the game, you will be presented with a series of difficult decisions that will test your courage and quick thinking. Do you want to fight or flee? The choice is yours, but be prepared to act fast - you only have a few seconds to make each decision.

Each decision you make will impact the outcome of the game, so choose wisely. Will you be the hero that saves the day, or will you succumb to the dangers that await you? The fate of Yondu The Fearless is in your hands.

With stunning graphics and intense action, Yondu's Journey is a game that you won't want to miss. So gather your courage and get ready for an adventure that will test your skills and leave you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to face the challenges of Yondu's Journey? The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: Beinhaltet Darstellungen intensiver Gewalt und Blut.

Welcome to Yondu's Journey, an interactive movie where every decision you make can lead to life or death. Take on the role of Yondu The Fearless and face the challenges that await you in this exciting game.

As you play through the game, you will be presented with a series of difficult decisions that will test your courage and quick thinking. Do you want to fight or flee? The choice is yours, but be prepared to act fast - you only have a few seconds to make each decision.

Each decision you make will impact the outcome of the game, so choose wisely. Will you be the hero that saves the day, or will you succumb to the dangers that await you? The fate of Yondu The Fearless is in your hands.

With stunning graphics and intense action, Yondu's Journey is a game that you won't want to miss. So gather your courage and get ready for an adventure that will test your skills and leave you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to face the challenges of Yondu's Journey? The choice is yours.
name: Yondu's Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with at least 512 MB of VRAM or OpenGL 3.0 compatible video card with at least 256 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join legendary warrior Yondu in this interactive fmv adventure as he battles for survival in hostile territory. With his cunning, strength, and unwavering spirit, Yondu rises above adversity in this epic tale of survival and adventure. Get ready for an unforgettable journey with Yondu the Fearless!
